name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
ingredients: 1 loaf Rhodes, frozen bread dough (or make your own) 1/4 chopped onion
2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts 1/2 C sliced olives
1/2 C your favorite barbeque sauce 1 lb. shredded pizza cheese
steps: Thaw bread dough and let rise until double in bulk. Roll out to 12" pizza. Cover dough with barbeque sauce.
Chop chicken breast into bite size pieces and cook chicken on stove until cooked. Add about 2-­‐3 Tbsp. more
barbeque sauce to coat chicken. Put 1/2 pound cheese on crust; top with chicken pieces, onions and olives.
Finish with the rest of cheese. Bake at 350 for 20-­‐25 minutes.
